home.valueTitle: Travel Has Never Been So Easy and Fun!
home.valueSubtitle: With artificial intelligence, we plan the ideal itinerary for you, saving time and maximizing your experience.

features.anywhereDesc: View or edit your itinerary at any time.

home.plansTitle: Choose the Perfect Plan for You
home.plansSubtitle: Start for free or unlock premium features with our Basic plan
home.basicPlanDesc: One-time purchase to create up to 10 itineraries with exclusive features
home.experienceSubtitle: We know how stressful and time-consuming planning a trip can be. With our app, you have the peace of mind of a perfect itinerary in the palm of your hand, so you can enjoy every second of your destination.
home.howItWorksSubtitle: Plan your trip with ease and speed
home.step1Desc: Choose your destination, dates, and preferences.
home.step3Desc: Travel worry-free with the ideal plan.
home.finalCtaSubtitle: Let our AI take care of everything.
